LanguageData.ANeedTend: The apiary needs to be tended to.
LanguageData.AResting: The apiary is resting, because the ambient temperature is below 10Â°C.
LanguageData.ANeedFlower: The apiary needs {0} more flowers around it for bees to forage.
LanguageData.ScenPartSettlemntDesc: You will start during the attack of a base. The coveted treasure, 150 gold and 300 silver, is located in rooms of this base.
LanguageData.APlaceWorker: The apiary needs to be one cell away from any other apiaries.
LanguageData.APlaceWorkerNoRoof: The apiary can't be builded under a roof.
LanguageData.VanillaFactionsExpandedVikings.Facepaint: Whether or not facepaintings are rendered on pawns.
LanguageData.VFEV.SlaverRaidDesc: A group of slavers from {0} have arrived nearby.\nBeing slavers they will try to capture as many of your colonists as possible.\nPrepare a defense or attack them preemptively.
LanguageData.VFEV.PillageRaidDesc: A group of vikings from {0} have arrived nearby.\nThey will attempt to burn your colony down, stealing whatever they can before they leave.\nPrepare a defense or attack them preemptively.
LanguageData.VFEV.CausedByDamage: Caused by: Being damaged while wearing a Bear headdress.
